titles: Great accomodation just a minute walk from railway station
Brand new hotel with a gourmet restaurant
Ideally located room in modern building
Quiet cozy place in the city
descriptions: Beautifully done hotel with efficient use of space. The property and room were clean and created a relaxed atmosphere in the centre of city.
The location of the apartment was perfect - close to all of the major attractions, best shopping, and great restaurants. Public transit was easy from the hotel.
Loved the decor, super clean, great location, had everything we needed, even down to cotton pads in the bathroom.
The staff were great, very helpful and seemed to be genuinely lovely people! I really appreciated their kindness.
It is the perfect room, great location, tastefully modern, not overpriced for what you get.
The location was great, very close to a metro station but also some of city attractions.
The house is very cute, clean and tidy. The design is exactly as in the picutres, modern and well refurbished. We really enjoyed the stay and the room was comfortable.
Beautiful modernised hotel. Friendly staff! We stayed for a week and found this was a good and quiet location in city.
